name: PaintBots! [BETA]
description:
Welcome to PaintBots! [BETA]

Two robot colonies battle it out in a paintball war. The specially designed paint rapidly dissolves the metal casing of the robots causing them to destruct. It’s a battle of power and territory and the victor will be crowning champion.

PaintBots is a split-screen co-op game where the players battle over the course of 3 rounds to become the crowning victor. But with dangerous upgrades that can be purchased between each round, anyone could be crowned.

Play against your friends in a selection of battle arenas where the environment is constantly changing, and everything is working against you.
